verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> gathered together <S%H6908><s%> all their armies <S%H4264><s%> to Aphek: <S%H663><s%> and the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> encamped <S%H2583><s%> by the spring <S%H5869><s%> which is in Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>

The lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> passed on <S%H5674><s%> by hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> and by thousands; <S%H505><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> passed on <S%H5674><s%> in the rear <S%H314><s%> with Achish. <S%H397><s%>

Then the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "What about these Hebrews? <S%H5680><s%>" Achish <S%H397><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> "Isn't <S%H1732><s%> this David, the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who has been with me these days, <S%H3117><s%> or rather these years, <S%H8141><s%> and I have found <S%H4672><s%> no fault <S%H3972><s%> in him since <S%H3117><s%> he fell <S%H5307><s%> away to this day? <S%H3117><s%>"

But the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were angry <S%H7107><s%> with him; <S%H8269><s%> and the princes of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7725><s%> "Make the man <S%H376><s%> return, <S%H7725><s%> that he may go back <S%H7725><s%> to his place <S%H4725><s%> where you have appointed <S%H6485><s%> him, <S%H3381><s%> and let him not go down with us to battle, <S%H4421><s%> lest in the battle <S%H4421><s%> he become an adversary <S%H7854><s%> to us. <S%H7521><s%> For with what should this fellow reconcile himself to his lord? <S%H113><s%> Should it not be with the heads <S%H7218><s%> of these men? <S%H582><s%>

Is not this David, <S%H1732><s%> of whom they sang <S%H6030><s%> one to another in dances, <S%H4246><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7586><s%> 'Saul has slain <S%H5221><s%> his thousands, <S%H505><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> his ten thousands? <S%H7233><s%>'"

Then Achish <S%H397><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3068><s%> "As Yahweh lives, <S%H2416><s%> you have been upright, <S%H3477><s%> and your going out <S%H3318><s%> and your coming in <S%H935><s%> with me in the army <S%H4264><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> in my sight; <S%H5869><s%> for I have not found <S%H4672><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in you since the day <S%H3117><s%> of your coming <S%H935><s%> to me to this day. <S%H3117><s%> Nevertheless, <S%H5633><s%> the lords don't <S%H5869><s%> favor you. <S%H2896><s%>
Therefore now return, <S%H7725><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> in peace, <S%H7965><s%> that you not displease <S%H7451><s%> the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>"

David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Achish, <S%H397><s%> "But what have I done? <S%H6213><s%> What have you found <S%H4672><s%> in your servant <S%H5650><s%> so long as <S%H3117><s%> I have been before you <S%H6440><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> that I may not go <S%H935><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> against the enemies <S%H341><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%> the king? <S%H4428><s%>"

Achish <S%H397><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> "I know <S%H3045><s%> that you are good <S%H2896><s%> in my sight, <S%H5869><s%> as an angel <S%H4397><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> Notwithstanding the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5927><s%> 'He shall not go up with us to the battle. <S%H4421><s%>'

Therefore now rise up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> with the servants <S%H5650><s%> of your lord <S%H113><s%> who have come <S%H935><s%> with you; <S%H7925><s%> and as soon as you are up early in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and have light, <S%H215><s%> depart. <S%H3212><s%>"

So David <S%H1732><s%> rose up early, <S%H7925><s%> he and his men, <S%H582><s%> to depart <S%H3212><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%> The Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>
